words.source: H1571 conj. + adv. gam 'also, even'; KJV 'and I have also', ESV 'I also', NASB 'I also'
H6965 Hiphil perf. 1cs of קוּם 'to rise; Hiphil: to establish, confirm'; KJV 'established', ESV 'established', NASB 'established'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H1285 n.fs berith 'covenant' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'my covenant', ESV 'my covenant', NASB 'My covenant'
H854 prep. ʾeth 'with' + 3mp suff.; KJV 'with them', ESV 'with them', NASB 'with them'
H5414 prep. l- + Qal inf. cstr. of נָתַן 'to give'; KJV 'to give', ESV 'to give', NASB 'to give'
prep. l- + 3mp suff.; KJV 'them', ESV 'them', NASB 'them'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H776 n.fs ʾerets 'land, earth' in construct; KJV 'the land of', ESV 'the land of', NASB 'the land of'
H3667 proper name; all trans. agree
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions (appositional, specifying 'the land of Canaan')
H776 n.fs ʾerets 'land, earth' in construct; KJV 'the land of', ESV 'the land of', NASB 'the land of'
H4033 n.mp megure 'sojournings, place of sojourning' + 3mp suff.; KJV 'their pilgrimage', ESV 'they lived as sojourners', NASB 'their sojournings'
H834 rel. pron. ʾasher 'who, which, that'; KJV 'wherein', ESV 'in which', NASB 'in which'
H1481 Qal perf. 3cp of גּוּר 'to sojourn, dwell as a stranger'; KJV 'they were strangers', ESV 'they lived as sojourners', NASB 'they sojourned'
prep. b- + 3fs suff. (referring to the land); KJV 'therein', ESV omits (absorbed into 'in which'), NASB omits
